org.matrix.androidsdk.data

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.data.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a room and the interactions we have with it.

      Default room creator

                                     int paginationCount,
                                     ApiCallback<TokensChunkResponse<Event>> callback)

        paginationCount - the number of events to retrieve.

      • getAvatarUrl

        public java.lang.String getAvatarUrl()
        Returns:
        the room avatar URL. If there is no defined one, use the members one (1:1 chat only).

      • getCallAvatarUrl

        public java.lang.String getCallAvatarUrl()
        The call avatar is the same as the room avatar except there are only 2 JOINED members. In this case, it returns the avtar of the other joined member.
        Returns:
        the call avatar URL.

      • getDirectoryVisibility

        public void getDirectoryVisibility(java.lang.String roomId,
                                   ApiCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
        Get the directory visibility of the room (see updateDirectoryVisibility(String, ApiCallback)). The directory visibility indicates if the room is listed among the directory list.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the user Id.
        callback - the callback returning the visibility response value.

      • updateJoinRules

        public void updateJoinRules(java.lang.String aRule,
                            ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> aCallBackResp)
        Update the join rule of the room.
        Parameters:
        aRule - the join rule: RoomState.JOIN_RULE_PUBLIC or RoomState.JOIN_RULE_INVITE
        aCallBackResp - the async callback

      • updateGuestAccess

        public void updateGuestAccess(java.lang.String aGuestAccessRule,
                              ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Update the guest access rule of the room. To deny guest access to the room, aGuestAccessRule must be set to RoomState.GUEST_ACCESS_FORBIDDEN.
        Parameters:
        aGuestAccessRule - the guest access rule: RoomState.GUEST_ACCESS_CAN_JOIN or RoomState.GUEST_ACCESS_FORBIDDEN
        callback - the async callback

        Parameters:
        aRespCallback - the asynchronous callback
        Returns:
        true if the request is sent, false otherwise

        public boolean sendReadReceipt(Event event,
                               ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> aRespCallback)
        Send the read receipt to the latest room message id.
        Parameters:
        event - send a read receipt to a provided event
        aRespCallback - asynchronous response callback
        Returns:

      • forgetReadMarker

        public void forgetReadMarker(ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Forget the current read marker This will update the read marker to match the read receipt
        Parameters:
        callback - the asynchronous callback

      • sendReadMarkers

        public boolean sendReadMarkers(java.lang.String aReadMarkerEventId,
                               java.lang.String aReadReceiptEventId,
                               ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> aRespCallback)
        Send the read markers
        Parameters:
        aReadMarkerEventId - the new read marker event id (if null use the latest known event id)
        aReadReceiptEventId - the new read receipt event id (if null use the latest known event id)
        aRespCallback - asynchronous response callback
        Returns:
        true if the request is sent, false otherwise

        Parameters:
        context - Application context for the content resolver.
        imageMessage - The imageMessage to fill.
        imageUri - The full size image uri.
        mimeType - The image mimeType

      • replaceTag

        public void replaceTag(java.lang.String oldTag,
                       java.lang.String newTag,
                       java.lang.Double newTagOrder,
                       ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Remove a tag and add another one.
        Parameters:
        oldTag - the tag to remove.
        newTag - the new tag to add. Nil can be used. Then, no new tag will be added.
        newTagOrder - the order of the new tag.
        callback - the operation callback.
